# TalentLean

> TalentLean is an AI-powered Latin American staff augmentation platform that helps companies build and scale remote tech teams. We provide transparent flat-fee pricing, full EOR (Employer of Record) compliance, and expert vetting of LatAm developers across all major technology stacks.

TalentLean specializes in nearshore talent sourcing from Latin America, offering mid-to-senior level engineers with expertise in full-stack, front-end, back-end, DevOps, QA, data, and mobile development. Our proprietary AI platform evaluates technical skills, code quality, English fluency, and soft skills, while human recruiters validate results to ensure the best candidate matches.

Key differentiators include:
- **Transparent Pricing**: Flat monthly service fee with no hidden mark-ups or percentages
- **Full Legal Compliance**: We handle payroll, benefits, taxes, and serve as legal shield for clients
- **AI-Powered Vetting**: Machine learning combined with expert recruiter validation
- **Risk-Free Engagement**: 30-day money-back guarantee
- **Dedicated Support**: Single point of contact for onboarding and ongoing issues

## Main Pages

- [Home](https://talentlean.com/): Landing page with service overview, how it works, benefits, and client testimonials
- [Pricing](https://talentlean.com/Pricing): Interactive pricing calculator for staff augmentation and staffing services with transparent cost breakdowns
- [FAQ](https://talentlean.com/FAQ): Frequently asked questions about services, pricing, vetting process, and compliance

## Technical Information

- **Platform**: React 18 with Vite build system
- **UI Framework**: TailwindCSS with Radix UI components
- **Lazy Loading**: Implemented for optimal performance
- **SEO Optimized**: Comprehensive meta tags, sitemap, robots.txt, canonical URLs
- **Performance**: 96/100 Lighthouse performance score

## SEO & Discoverability

- [Sitemap](https://talentlean.com/sitemap.xml): Complete list of all pages for search engine crawlers
- [Robots.txt](https://talentlean.com/robots.txt): Crawler directives and sitemap reference

## Optional

Additional technical documentation and implementation details are available in the GitHub repository for developers and technical partners.
